verses.text: Then he brought me \w back|strong="H7725"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* which \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*; and it \add was\add* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* unto me; This \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* shall be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*, it shall not be \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* in by it; because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, hath \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* in by it, therefore it shall be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*.

\add It is\add* for the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w*; the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w*, he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* in it to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; he shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of \add that\add* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the same.

¶ Then \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* he me the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and I \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w mark|strong="H7760"\w* \w well|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* with thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* with thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* all that I \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee concerning all the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and all the \w laws|strong="H8451"\w* thereof; and \w mark|strong="H7760"\w* \w well|strong="H3820"\w* the entering \w in|strong="H3996"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, with every going \w forth|strong="H4161"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.  +  r 44.5  t mark well: Heb. set thine heart *  +  r 44.5  t mark well: Heb. set thine heart *

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; O ye \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, let it \w suffice|strong="H7227"\w* you of all your \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*,

In that ye have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add into my sanctuary\add* \w strangers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* in \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, to be in my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, to \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* it, \add even\add* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, when ye \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and they have \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w because|strong="H0413"\w* of all your \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.\f + \fr 44.7 \ft strangers: Heb. children of a stranger\f*

And ye have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of mine holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: but ye have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of my \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* in my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* for yourselves.\f + \fr 44.8 \ft my charge: or, my ward, or, ordinance\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; No \w stranger|strong="H1121"\w*, \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, nor \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* in \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, of any stranger that \add is\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that are gone away \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me, when \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, which went astray \w away|strong="H8582"\w* from me \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*; they shall even \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

Yet they shall be \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* in my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \add having\add* \w charge|strong="H6486"\w* at the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w ministering|strong="H8334"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: they shall \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto them.

Because they \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* unto them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, and caused the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w fall|strong="H4383"\w* into \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; therefore have I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, and they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 44.12 \ft caused…: Heb. were for a stumblingblock of iniquity unto, etc\f*

And they shall not come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* unto me, to do the office of a \w priest|strong="H3547"\w* unto me, nor to come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to any of my holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, in the most \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place:\add* but they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*, and their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* which they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*.

But I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* them \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, for all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* thereof, and for all that shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* therein.

¶ But the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, that \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w astray|strong="H8582"\w* from me, they shall come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to me to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto me, and they shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto me the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*:

They shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, and they shall come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to my \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto me, and they shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* when they \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* in at the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, they shall be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H6593"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*; and no \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* shall \w come|strong="H5927"\w* upon them, whiles they \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and \w within|strong="H1004"\w*.

They shall have \w linen|strong="H6593"\w* \w bonnets|strong="H6287"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, and shall have \w linen|strong="H6593"\w* \w breeches|strong="H4370"\w* upon their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*; they shall not \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* \add themselves\add* with any thing that causeth \w sweat|strong="H3154"\w*.\f + \fr 44.18 \ft with…: or, in sweating places: Heb. in, or, with sweat\f*

And when they go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, \add even\add* into the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, they shall put \w off|strong="H6584"\w* their \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* wherein they \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H3240"\w* them in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, and they shall \w put|strong="H3847"\w* on \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*; and they shall not \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with their \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*.

Neither shall they \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, nor suffer their \w locks|strong="H6545"\w* to grow \w long|strong="H7971"\w*; they shall \w only|strong="H3697"\w* \w poll|strong="H3697"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

Neither shall any \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, when they \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.

Neither shall they \w take|strong="H3947"\w* for their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, nor her that is put \w away|strong="H1644"\w*: but they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w maidens|strong="H1330"\w* of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* that had a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* before.\f + \fr 44.22 \ft put…: Heb. thrust forth\f*\f + \fr 44.22 \ft that had…: Heb. from a priest\f*

And they shall \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add the difference\add* between the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* and \w profane|strong="H2455"\w*, and cause them to \w discern|strong="H3045"\w* between the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

And in \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* they shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H8199"\w*; \add and\add* they shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* it according to my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: and they shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w laws|strong="H8451"\w* and my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* in all mine \w assemblies|strong="H4150"\w*; and they shall \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*.

And they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* at no \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w person|strong="H0120"\w* to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* themselves: but for \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or for \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, or for \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, or for \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, for \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, or for \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* that hath had no \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, they may \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* themselves.
And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he is \w cleansed|strong="H2893"\w*, they shall \w reckon|strong="H5608"\w* unto him \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, unto the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* his sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

And it shall be unto them for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: I \add am\add* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: and ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them no \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: I \add am\add* their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

They shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*; and every dedicated \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be theirs.\f + \fr 44.29 \ft dedicated: or, devoted\f*

And the \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of all the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of all \add things\add*, and every \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* of all, of every \add sort\add* of your \w oblations|strong="H8641"\w*, shall be the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w*: ye shall also \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* the \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of your \w dough|strong="H6182"\w*, that he may cause the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 44.30 \ft And the first: or, And the chief\f*

The \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of any thing that is dead of \w itself|strong="H5038"\w*, or \w torn|strong="H2966"\w*, whether it be \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w* or \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.
